title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 688/94 of 28 March 1994 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3713/92 deferring the date of application of Article 11 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2092/91 on organic production of agricultural products and indications referring thereto on agricultural products and foodstuffs, with regard to the imports from certain third countries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 688/94 of 28 March 1994 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3713/92 deferring the date of application of Article 11 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2092/91 on organic production of agricultural products and indications  referring thereto on agricultural products and foodstuffs, with regard to the imports from certain third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 3713/92 'for a period of six months' is replaced by 'for a period of 26 months'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 March 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 198, 22. 7. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 239, 24. 9. 1993, p. 10.
(3) OJ No L 378, 23. 12. 1992, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 153, 25. 6. 1993, p. 15.
(5) OJ No L 11, 17. 1. 1992, p. 14.
